subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner, the No. 10 seed, lost to Paul-Henry Mathieu, 6-7 (2-7), 6-4, 6-4, 3-6, 18-16, in the second-longest match in French Open history.
snippet: John Isner, the No. 10 seed, lost to Paul-Henry Mathieu, 6-7 (2-7), 6-4, 6-4, 3-6, 18-16, in the second-longest match in French Open history.
